import React,{useContext, useState} from 'react'; import { GlobleState } from '../../GlobleState'; import Menu from '../headers/icons/menu.svg' import Close from '../headers/icons/close.svg' import Cart from '../headers/icons/cart.svg' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; function Header() { const state = useContext(GlobleState) const [isLogged,setIsLogged] = state.userApi.isLogged const [isAdmin,setIsAdmin] = state.userApi.isAdmin return
